languages.text: "Груз, пожалуй, не совсем верное слово — это толпа людей в потрепанной форме войск Империума. Они уверяют, что вы их командир, и это именно вы спасли их из Комморры. По их рассказам, некий ксенос в маске, говорящий загадками, каким-то образом провел их на корабль".

"I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander who saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."
languages.original_text: "Груз, пожалуй, не совсем верное слово — это толпа людей в потрепанной форме войск Империума. Они уверяют, что вы их командир, и это именно вы спасли их из Комморры. По их рассказам, некий ксенос в маске, говорящий загадками, каким-то образом провел их на корабль".

traits.locale_text: "I suppose ‘item' is not quite a correct term. This is a crowd of people in worn-out military uniform of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander and it was you who saved them from Commorragh. According to their words, some masked xenos speaking in riddles led them into the ship somehow."

"I suppose ‘item' is not quite a correct term. This is a crowd of people in worn-out military uniform of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander and it was you who saved them from Commorragh. According to their words, some masked xenos speaking in riddles led them into the ship somehow."

"I suppose ‘cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander and it was you who saved them from Commorragh. According to them, some masked xenos speaking in riddles led them into the ship somehow."

"I suppose ‘cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander and it was you who saved them from Commorragh. According to them, some masked xenos speaking in riddles led them into the ship somehow."

"I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander who saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

languages.text: “我猜‘货物’这个词恐怕不太准确。那是一群穿着帝国军服的人，他们坚持说您是他们的指挥官，是您把他们从科摩罗解救出来的。根据他们的说法，有个戴着面具的异形说着古怪的谜语，不知怎么就把他们带到了船上。”
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander who saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: “我猜‘货物’这个词恐怕不太准确。那是一群穿着帝国军服的人，他们坚持说您是他们的指挥官，是您把他们从科摩罗解救出来的。根据他们的说法，有个戴着面具的异形说着古怪的谜语，不知怎么就把他们带到了船上。”

languages.text: « "Cargaison" n'est peut-être pas le terme approprié ici. Il s'agit d'une foule de gens vêtus d'uniformes élimés de l'Imperium. Ils soutiennent que vous êtes leur {mf|commandant|commandante} et que vous les avez sauvés de Commorragh. À les en croire, un xénos masqué au parler énigmatique aurait réussi à les conduire jusqu'à notre bord. »
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander who saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: « "Cargaison" n'est peut-être pas le terme approprié ici. Il s'agit d'une foule de gens vêtus d'uniformes élimés de l'Imperium. Ils soutiennent que vous êtes leur {mf|commandant|commandante} et que vous les avez sauvés de Commorragh. À les en croire, un xénos masqué au parler énigmatique aurait réussi à les conduire jusqu'à notre bord. »

languages.text: "Ich schätze, 'Fracht' trifft es nicht ganz. Es handelt sich um eine Gruppe von Menschen und Xenos in Militäruniformen des Imperiums. Sie bestehen darauf, dass Ihr {mf|ihr Kommandant|ihre Kommandantin} seid und sie aus Commorragh gerettet habt. Wenn man ihren Berichten Glauben schenken darf, ist es maskierten Xenos, die in Rätseln gesprochen haben, irgendwie gelungen, sie an Bord zu transportieren."
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander who saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schätze, 'Fracht' trifft es nicht ganz. Es handelt sich um eine Gruppe von Menschen und Xenos in Militäruniformen des Imperiums. Sie bestehen darauf, dass Ihr {mf|ihr Kommandant|ihre Kommandantin} seid und sie aus Commorragh gerettet habt. Wenn man ihren Berichten Glauben schenken darf, ist es maskierten Xenos, die in Rätseln gesprochen haben, irgendwie gelungen, sie an Bord zu transportieren."

languages.text: «Supongo que "cargamento" no es la palabra correcta. Se trata de un grupo de personas con uniformes militares del Imperium. Insisten en que usted es su comandante y que los ha salvado de Commorragh. Según dicen, un xenos enmascarado que hablaba con acertijos logró transportarlos a la nave de algún modo».
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander who saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que "cargamento" no es la palabra correcta. Se trata de un grupo de personas con uniformes militares del Imperium. Insisten en que usted es su comandante y que los ha salvado de Commorragh. Según dicen, un xenos enmascarado que hablaba con acertijos logró transportarlos a la nave de algún modo».

languages.text: 「『貨物』という表現は適切ではないだろう。帝国の擦り切れた軍服を着た人々の群れだ。彼らは、あなたこそが彼らの司令官であり、コモラフから救ってくれた人物だと強く主張している。彼らの話が本当なら、謎めいた言葉を話す仮面の異種族が、どういうわけか彼らをこの船に送り込んだのだという」
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander who saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."

traits.locale_text: 「『貨物』という表現は適切ではないだろう。帝国の擦り切れた軍服を着た人々の群れだ。彼らは、あなたこそが彼らの司令官であり、コモラフから救ってくれた人物だと強く主張している。彼らの話が本当なら、謎めいた言葉を話す仮面の異種族が、どういうわけか彼らをこの船に送り込んだのだという」

languages.text: "Buna 'gönderi' de denemez aslında. Gelenler, eski püskü İmparatorluk üniformaları giyinmiş bir grup insan. Israrla kendilerini Commorragh'tan kurtaran komutanın siz olduğunuzu söylüyorlar. Dediklerinin aslı varsa... Bilmece gibi konuşan maskeli zenolar, onları bir şekilde gemiye getirmiş."
languages.original_text: "I suppose 'cargo' is not quite the correct term. It is a crowd of people in worn military uniforms of the Imperium. They insist that you are their commander who saved them from Commorragh. If their account is to be believed, some masked xenos who spoke in riddles somehow managed to transport them on board."
